text: Englitazone is a hypoglycemic agent of thiazolidinedione (glitazone) class. == See also == * Ciglitazone * Darglitazone * Netoglitazone * Troglitazone * Rivoglitazone—currently in clinical trials * Pioglitazone, lobeglitazone, rosiglitazone—the only ones currently in clinical use == References == Category:Chromanes Category:Thiazolidinediones
title: Englitazone
